an4.269:1.1: …pe… Attana ca pharusavaco hoti, paranca pharusaya vacaya samadapeti, pharusaya vacaya ca samanunno hoti, pharusaya vacaya ca vannam bhasati …pe….
an4.269:2.1: Attana ca pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti, paranca pharusaya vacaya veramaniya samadapeti, pharusaya vacaya veramaniya ca samanunno hoti, pharusaya vacaya veramaniya ca vannam bhasati—imehi kho …pe….
